# NPP - Defence Supply Chain Resiliency Framework Tender Announcement
================================================uratorTab

## Tender Details
-----------------

* **Reference Number**: cb-8709-22223629
* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-6000609611
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-16T14:00:00

## Description
-------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) and the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) invite interested suppliers to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the design of a Defence Supply Chain (DSC) Resiliency Framework.

The proposed framework aims to analyze emerging risks that may impact support to CAF operations and provide evidence-based analysis for senior leadership. The framework will be an unclassified document, facilitating the connection to the larger Government of Canada (GoC) Resiliency ecosystem.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work involves the development of the DSC Resiliency Framework. The selected contractor will be responsible for designing a framework that bridges global threat environment analytical gaps in the DSC. The framework must provide synchronized and real-time horizon scanning and analysis of key strategic sustainment factors and emerging risks that may impact CAF operations.

### Requirements

Suppliers interested in competing for this tender must be currently holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the W6369-210242/A (or W6369-210242/AA) series of SAs. All SA holders have been invited to submit a bid in response to this solicitation.

### Important Notice

Suppliers interested in becoming a SA holder should consult the following CanadaBuys Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-21-00952141.
